choices.C: From Google Admin Panel, go to Audit, and select Rules Audit Log.
choices.A: From Google Admin Panel, go to Audit, and select Access Transparency Logs.
choices.D: From Google Admin Panel, go to Audit, and select Admin Audit Log.
choices.B: From Google Admin Panel, go to Audit, and select Login Audit Log.

questions.question_text: Your organization wants more visibility into actions taken by Google staff related to your data for audit and security reasons. They are specifically interested in understanding the actions performed by Google support staff with regard to the support cases you have opened with Google. What should you do to gain more visibility?

choices.B: Disable automatic forwarding for all field technicians.
choices.A: Place the field technicians in a separate organizational unit (OU) and disable the Gmail mobile app.
choices.C: Place the Field Technicians in a Group. Create and apply a domain wide ‘Reject message’ rule to the entire group.
choices.D: Create a routing rule by using the Reject message option for the organization's domain, and apply the rule to the field technician organizational unit (OU).

discussion.content:
The most appropriate solution to enforce the policy and restrict external emails for the field technicians is:

D. Create a routing rule by using the Reject message option for the organization's domain, and apply the rule to the field technician organizational unit (OU).

Selected Answer: D
https://support.google.com/a/answer/6297084?hl=en

choices.B: Reset the sign-in cookies of the employee.
choices.E: Instruct the employee to clear the browser cache.
choices.A: Instruct the employee to make a copy of the document by using the Google Drive user interface, then work from the copy.
choices.C: Instruct the employee to check the size of the document and divide the information into smaller parts if it is close to the limit.

You want to identify why they can't access the file and fix the problem. What should you do? (Choose two.)

choices.A: Provision former user accounts with Cloud Identity licenses, generate a new Google password, and place them in an OU with all Google Workspace and other Google services disabled.
choices.D: Provide a list of all active employees to the managers of your company's Analytics, AdSense, etc. accounts.
choices.C: Use the Transfer Tool for Unmanaged Accounts to send requests to the former users to transfer their account to your domain as a managed account.
choices.B: Contact Google Enterprise Support to provide a list of all accounts on your domains that access Google services outside Workspace, and have them converted to managed accounts.

questions.question_text:
In the years before your organization moved to Google Workspace, it was relatively common practice for users to create unmanaged Google Accounts with their corporate email address (for example, to monitor Analytics, manage AdSense, and collaborate in Docs with other partners who were on Google Workspace).

How do we provision users who previously owned unmanaged Google Accounts without having to lose access to their data?

discussion.content: B - must be.

Acredito que B seja a opção correta por citar "pequena empresa" e dizer que ainda não tem contas criadas no Ldap.

Documentação:

Se precisar fazer upload de uma grande quantidade de usuários, você pode usar um arquivo CSV. Se você estiver atribuindo ou atualizando novas licenças usando a coluna Novas licenças [somente upload] , o limite será de 200 usuários. Caso contrário, o limite é de 150.000 usuários. Para obter detalhes sobre a coluna Novas licenças [somente upload] , acesse Referência da coluna .

No entanto, se você tiver um servidor LDAP, como o Microsoft Active Directory, ou tiver conhecimentos de programação, recomendamos outras opções para "organizações maiores". Para obter detalhes, acesse Opções para adicionar usuários .

Selected Answer: B
Since it is required to populate the worker address against each user B is the best option

https://support.google.com/a/answer/40057#zippy=%2Cmake-sure-this-is-the-right-option%2Cstep-enter-users-information

choices.C: Manually create each new user account in the Admin console. Then add the work address to each new user.
choices.A: Write and deploy a server-side script by using the Admin SDK Directory API.
choices.D: Sync the new accounts by using the Google Cloud Directory Sync (GCDS) server.
choices.B: Ensure that the account information is properly added into the CSV file created from the downloaded template. Upload the file in the Admin console by using the Bulk update users process.

questions.question_text: You work for a small company and are creating new Workspace accounts for 100 temporary users. These temporary users do not currently have any user accounts in your LDAP directory. Also, you want to add a work address to each users’ account. You want to do this task quickly and efficiently. What should you do?
